jd: From: Narsimha Kathi, iTech US narsimha.k@itechus.net Reply to: narsimha.k@itechus.net Hi , We have a job opportunity for you, please find the below details and let me know your interest ASAP. ( React is a must )Good knowledge on Java, Microservices & Spring boot.Understanding of good RDBMS practices.?
